examples: Selaginella tamariscina var. ulanchotensis Ching & W.Wang in Fl. Pl. Herb.  Chinae Bor.-Or., 1: 69 ((1958). Corispermum flexuosum W.Wang & Fuh in Fl. Pl.  Herb. Chinae Bor.-Or., 2: 111 (1959).
source: Dates from Index Herb. Sin.: 279 (1993). Index Herbariorum gives the birth year  as 1909 and no year of death.
